Shrek

Rank: 405


A mean lord exiles fairytale creatures to the swamp of a grumpy ogre- who must go on a quest and rescue a princess for the lord in order to get his land back.


Director: Andrew Adamson

Writer: William Steig, Ted Elliott, Terry Rossio

Stars: Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz

Tags: Animal Adventure, Buddy Comedy, Computer Animation, Dark Comedy, Fairy Tale, Feel,Good Romance, Parody, Quest, Quirky Comedy, Raunchy Comedy
